distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for rzsz fixes the following issues:

- L3: sz of rzsz segfaults in zsdata() (bsc#1086416)
- VUL-0: CVE-2018-10195: rzsz: sz can leak data to receiving side (bsc#1090051)
- rzsz-0.12.20-976.7: illegal use of freed variable (bsc#529899)
- /usr/bin/lsb segfaults [rzsz] (bsc#1076576)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: lrzsz before version 0.12.21~rc can leak information to the receiving side due to an incorrect length check in the function zsdata that causes a size_t to wrap around.
notes.title: CVE description
